  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method where the execution of the program starts.
      Parameters:
      args - The command line arguments passed to the program.

    • initialize

      private static void initialize(String path, String inputFileFolder, String outputFolder)
      Initializes the environment by deleting existing files and folders.
      Parameters:
      path - The base path of the environment.
      inputFileFolder - The folder containing input files.
      outputFolder - The folder containing output files.

    • do_part1

      private static String do_part1(String part1_manifest, String path, String inputFileFolder, String outputFolder)
      Performs part 1 of the process.
      Parameters:
      part1_manifest - The file name of part 1's manifest.
      path - The base path of the environment.
      inputFileFolder - The folder containing input files.
      outputFolder - The folder containing output files.
      Returns:
      The file name of part 2's manifest（will be returned).

    • do_part2

      private static String do_part2(String part2_manifest, String path, String outputFolder)
      Performs part 2 of the process.
      Parameters:
      part2_manifest - The file name of part 2's manifest.
      path - The base path of the environment.
      outputFolder - The folder containing output files.
      Returns:
      The file name of part 3's manifest.

    • do_part3

      private static void do_part3(String part3_manifest, String path, String outputFileFolder)
      Performs part 3 of the process.
      Parameters:
      part3_manifest - The file name of part 3's manifest.
      path - The base path of the environment.
      outputFileFolder - The folder containing output files.

    • readOneFile

      private static Movie[] readOneFile(String path, String fileName, String errorOutputFileName)
      Reads movie records from a file, processes them, and returns an array of Movie objects. Records errors encountered during processing and outputs them to a specified file.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the file.
      fileName - The name of the file to read.
      errorOutputFileName - The name of the file to output errors.
      Returns:
      An array of Movie objects.

    • scanEntryString

      private static Movie scanEntryString(String entry) throws BadSemanticException, SyntaxErrorException
      Parses a string representing a movie entry and creates a Movie object.
      Parameters:
      entry - The string representing a movie entry.
      Returns:
      The Movie object created from the string.
      Throws:
      BadSemanticException - If there is a semantic error in the movie entry.
      SyntaxErrorException - If there is a syntax error in the movie entry.

    • resizeArray

      private static Movie[] resizeArray(Movie[] original)
      Resizes the given array of Movie objects to accommodate additional elements. This method creates a new array with a length increased by 100 compared to the original array. It copies all elements from the original array to the new array and returns the new array.
      Parameters:
      original - The original array of Movie objects to be resized.
      Returns:
      A new array of Movie objects with increased length.

    • mergeMovieList

      private static Movie[] mergeMovieList(Movie[] oldList, Movie[] newList)
      Merges two arrays of Movie objects into one.
      Parameters:
      oldList - The first array of Movie objects.
      newList - The second array of Movie objects.
      Returns:
      The merged array of Movie objects.

    • recordErrorIntoFile

      private static void recordErrorIntoFile(PrintWriter outputFile, String errorMessage, String originalRecord, String fileName, int currentLineNumber)
      Records an error message, original record, file name, and line number into a specified file.
      Parameters:
      outputFile - The PrintWriter object for writing to the output file.
      errorMessage - The error message to record.
      originalRecord - The original record causing the error.
      fileName - The name of the file where the error occurred.
      currentLineNumber - The line number where the error occurred.

    • view

      private static void view(Movie[][] movies, String[] genreNames)
      Displays the main menu and handles user interactions.
      Parameters:
      movies - An array containing arrays of Movie objects (genres).
      genreNames - An array containing the names of genres.

    • selectMovieArray

      private static int selectMovieArray(Movie[][] movies, String[] genreNames)
      Allows the user to select a genre array (genre) to navigate.
      Parameters:
      movies - An array containing arrays of Movie objects (genres).
      genreNames - An array containing the names of genres.
      Returns:
      The index of the selected genre array, or -1 if exit is chosen.

    • navigateMovies

      private static void navigateMovies(Movie[][] movies, int genreIndex)
      Navigates through an array of movies, allowing the user to move forwards or backwards through the list.
      Parameters:
      movies - An array of movies categorized by genre.
      genreIndex - The index of the genre to navigate through.
